com.travelportal.controller

Class BookingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelportal.controller.BookingController

  • @Controller
public class BookingController
extends Object
    Controller class to manage methods and mappings used for flight booking
    Author:
    naveen.kumar

      • ticketPDF

        @RequestMapping(value="/createTicketPDF",
                method=GET)
public String ticketPDF(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method to generate the PDF of ticket using ticketId and calling util method createTicketPDF(ticketId)
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        Returns:
        "ticket" page and pdf in new tab
